memberdef.name: REGISTER_G_LOG_HANDLER
memberdef.initializer: g_log_set_handler((name), G_LOG_LEVEL_MASK | G_LOG_FLAG_FATAL \ | G_LOG_FLAG_RECURSION, \ purple_glib_log_handler, NULL)

memberdef.name: uiops
memberdef.initializer:
= { finch_debug_print, finch_debug_is_enabled,
NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL }

simplesect.para: The PurpleDebugUiOps structure populated with the appropriate functions.

memberdef.argsstring: (const gchar *domain, GLogLevelFlags flags, const gchar *msg, gpointer user_data)
memberdef.name: purple_glib_log_handler
